prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek blue body and dynamic lightning features.
I want a mythical creature that embodies the power of storms, with vivid colors and agile movements.
Generate a Pokemon that represents both wind and thunder, showcasing impressive electric abilities.
Make a unique design for an electric Pokemon that has a fierce expression and a swirling tail.
Imagine a Pokemon with a majestic aura, combining shades of blue and black with a striking horn.
Design a creature that thrives in mountainous regions, capturing the essence of electricity in its form.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that commands the skies with its electric powers and agile flight.
